ValidationRule.description: Customer PO is mandatory when Outcome of Obtain Customer Info is marked as "Information Obtained"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Process__c , 'Escalation Obtain Customer Info'),ISPICKVAL(Process__c , 'Obtain Customer Info')),ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , 'Information Obtained'),OR(AND(ISBLANK(PurchaseOrder_Number__c), CONTAINS(Description__c, 'PO')),AND(ISBLANK(Profile_Number__c), CONTAINS(Description__c, 'Profile'))))
